name: Domes Noruz Mykonos
description: Near Mykonos New Port With a stay at Domes Noruz Mykonos - Adults Only in Mykonos, you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Mykonos New Port and Mykonos Old Port. This 5-star hotel is 4.4 mi (7.1 km) from Ornos Beach and 5.1 mi (8.2 km) from Platis Gialos Beach. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and coffee/tea in a common area. Free self parking is available onsite. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Agios Stefanos Beach - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi Houlakia Beach - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi Mykonos New Port - 1.7 km / 1 mi Tourlos Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi Armenistis Lighthouse - 3 km / 1.9 mi Archaeological Museum of Mykonos - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi Mykonos Old Port - 3.1 km / 2 mi Matoyianni Street - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi Mykonos Library - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi Mykonos Town Hall - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi Aegean Maritime Museum - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Church of Panagia Paraportiani - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Mykonos Museum of Folklore - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Lena's House - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Tria Pigadia - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi The nearest airports are: Mykonos Island National Airport (JMK) - 6 km / 3.7 mi Ermoupolis (JSY-Syros Island National) - 39.8 km / 24.8 mi Naxos (JNX-Naxos Island National) - 48.2 km / 30 mi Enjoy a satisfying meal at Topos Bar Restaurant serving guests of Domes Noruz Mykonos - Adults Only. Need to unwind? Take a break with a tasty beverage at one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. For the benefit of our customers, we have provided a rating based on our rating system. Make yourself at home in one of the 38 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.Ticket Package

name: Amyth of Mykonos Hotel
address: Agios Stefanos P O Box 7159, Agios Stefanos 846 00
description: Situated in Agios Stefanos, 500 metres from Agios Stefanos Beach, Amyth of Mykonos Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature sea views. At Amyth of Mykonos Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Amyth of Mykonos Hotel include Choulakas Beach, Tourlos Beach and Mykonos New Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Boheme Mykonos Adults Only - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Boheme Mykonos Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour room service, daily housekeeping, grocery deliveries, private check in/check out, 24-hour front desk are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, massage, garden. Boheme Mykonos Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Mykonos or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: The Ammonite Resort
address: Θεση Χαλαρα Super Paradise, Plintri, Mykonos, Greece, 84600, Plintri 846 00
description: Located within 2.5 km of Super Paradise Beach and 2.9 km of Agrari Beach, The Ammonite Resort offers rooms in Super Paradise Beach. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. There is free private parking and the property provides paid airport shuttle service. At the hotel every room is fitted with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a terrace with a sea view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The Ammonite Resort features certain units that include a patio, and the rooms come with a coffee machine. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Mykonos Windmills is 4.8 km from The Ammonite Resort, while Archaeological Museum of Mykonos is 5.9 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 1 km from the hotel.

name: Bill & Coo Coast Suites - Adults Only
description: Located right on the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Bill & Coo Coast Suites boasts a water's edge swimming pool and a restaurant serving traditional Greek cuisine. Blending traditional Cycladic decoration with modern minimalistic touches, every suite at Bill & Coo Coast opens to a balcony with Aegean Sea views while some also enjoy pool views. Some units feature a private pool, while others feature an outdoor hot tub. Each features a seating area where a satellite, flat-screen TV is also available. Guests may also use the iPad provided. Every suite features a state of the art bathroom stocked with a shower and free toiletries. Greek & American breakfast is served. The on-site bar features an abundance of refreshments. Massage treatments can be enjoyed on request and at extra charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos is located within approximately 4 km of Bill & Coo Coast Suites. Mykonos Port is 6 km away, while Mykonos Airport is at 4 km. Free private parking is possible on-site.

name: Casa Cook Mykonos - Adults Only
description: Situated in Ornos, the Cycladic-style Casa Cook Mykonos - Adults Only provides elegant accommodation with minimalist décor, a 5-minute drive from Agios Ioannis Beach. It features a swimming pool, hot tub and bar. Featuring furnishings in white hues, a seating area and Pandrosia toiletries, all accommodation types at the Casa Cook Mykonos - Adults Only have a TV, air conditioner and balcony. Most units offer views of the Aegean Sea. An array of activities can be enjoyed in the surroundings, including hiking and snorkelling. Free WiFi is offered in all public areas and rooms. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can offer information on nearby beaches such as Ornos and Psarou. Mykonos International Airport is 4 km away. The property offers free private parking.

name: Hippie Chic Hotel
description: Right on the beach of Agios Ioannis, Hippie Chic Hotel features a pool and elegant accommodation with free WiFi. Guests can taste Mediterranean cuisine and seafood from the on-site restaurant or sushi from the poolside bar. Built in respect with the local architecture, all rooms and suites are fitted with king-size, Coco-mat beds and relaxing interiors. Each comes with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and mini fridge. Some units also offer unobstructed views of the Aegean Sea. The majority of rooms and suites have their own private veranda. However, this does not guarantee visual privacy, as the existence of walls and partitions would prevent the beautiful scenery of Aegean sea and Delos island, you come here to enjoy. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos Town is around 4 km away from Hippie Chic Hotel. The island’s port and airport are both 4.5 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: Nomad Mykonos
description: Set in Kalo Livadi, 700 metres from Kalo Livadi Beach, Nomad Mykonos offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel provides a hot tub and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Nomad Mykonos all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. Loulos Beach is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Mykonos Windmills is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 6 km from Nomad Mykonos.

name: Tropicana Hotel , Suites & Villas Mykonos
description: Located right on the famous Paradise Beach, Tropicana Hotel, Suites & Villas Mykonos is a complex offering accommodation and services for all tastes and wishes. Divided in four wings it features luxurious rock covered buildings or white washed rooms, two pools attached to pool bars for numerous refreshments as well as two infinity pools with panoramic sea view to relax throughout the day. Each elegantly furnished unit possesses air-conditioning, smart TVs with satellite access and coffee/tea making facilities. Accommodation varies to apartments that include a well-equipped kitchenette for self catering, deluxe rooms with outdoor hot tubs and suites/villas with private pools. All of them have a private bathroom with shower, fully equipped with amenities and complimentary WiFi access all over. Guests can enjoy a wide variety of local delights in our Mediterranean buffet breakfast served at “Comus” restaurant, as well as an all day a la carte menu, with breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea. Snacks are served in the 3 pool bars and the snack bar. Guests can also enjoy the Greek and Italian dishes served at the beach restaurant. For those who seek body and mind balance, our state of the art gym operates daily and is located inside our own “Calliope” Spa, which offers a variety of massage therapies and additionally features a steam bath, sauna and hot tub. The picturesque main town and port of Mykonos is 5 km away from Tropicana Hotel, Suites & Villas Mykonos. Mykonos Airport is at 3 km. Free parking can be found near the premises.

name: Rochari Hotel
description: Situated conveniently in the heart of Mykonos Town, Hotel Rochari offers buffet breakfast and free WiFi. The hotel outdoor swimming pool with stunning views to the town and the Aegean Sea and a garden. Mykonos Windmills is 500 metres away and Little Venice is a 6-minute walk from the hotel. Each room includes a bathroom with bath or shower and free toiletries, mini fringe, flat-screen TV, safe, hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities. The on-site restaurant serves Greek cuisine. Hotel Rochari offers a terrace. Non-stop assistance is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include the Archaeological Museum of Mykonos and Mykonos Old Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from the property. Nammos Mykonos is 3.2 km away.

name: Katikies Mykonos - The Leading Hotels of the World
description: Located just 500 metres from the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Katikies Mykonos is a 5-star boutique hotel featuring a selection of fine dining options, 2 infinity pools, a spa centre and a gym. Blending Cycladic style with modern elements, the hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms and suites with unobstructed sea view. Featuring private pools or outdoor jetted tubs, the units at Katikies Mykonos open to a private terrace with lounge area. Facilities include a flat-screen satellite TV, I-Pod music player, Nespresso coffee machine, in-room safe and minibar. The modern bathrooms are fitted with hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Room service is available 24/7. Guests can relax at the sun loungers by the pool, enjoy a refreshing dip at the infinity pools or rejuvenate at the on-site spa centre offering a variety of massage sessions, feet washing rituals and rejuvenating facial and body treatments. A fashion boutique with Greek and international designers and brands is also featured on site. Dining options include Botrini's Mykonos restaurant. After the amazing success of Botrini’s Santorini in the emblematic Katikies Santorini Hotel, the island of Mykonos will be boasting its very own Botrini’s Restaurant in the stunning premises of Katikies Mykonos Hotel. Botrini’s Mykonos stays true to all the values that earned Botrini’s its multiple awards and of course its Michelin-star, but in a most mesmerising Cycladic setting with the eternal blue of the Aegean Sea serving as the ideal background. In a truly magical ambiance and in front of the infinity pool seamlessly blending in with the sea and the sky, guests sample the eye-catching dishes of renowned Greek-Italian chef Ettore Botrini. Here the freshest and finest gifts of the sea and the land find their way into the chef’s kitchen to be transformed into refined pieces of contemporary culinary art. At the Lower Deck Lounge, where the whitewashed background is disturbed only by the blooming bougainvilleas, that is where you can spend a full day dedicated to the indulgence of your palate and the relaxation of your mind. The glorious Greek sun reflects its beams on the iconic whitewashed setting of the Upper Deck Lounge and the view of the infinity pool almost becoming one with the azure waters of the Aegean Sea where you can take your pick from the tempting choices of the exciting all-day menu, based on Greek flavours but with a creative international touch. Finally, Fleur de Miraval's ultra-chic Champagne Bar awaits to become your personal haven of elegance and exquisite tastes.

name: Andronikos Hotel
description: Located on a small hilltop overlooking Mykonos Town, Andronikos Hotel boasts an award-winning restaurant and also features an outdoor pool and wellness centre. Each airy room is distinctive in style, while all have a large bed, minibar and free Wi-Fi. Many rooms offer a spa bath, while most have fantastic views of the island and the sea. You can explore authentic Greek cuisine at the exquisite Lady Finger Restaurant which serves a 4-course degustation menu. Located around the pool, the Orange Blue Bar serves snacks around the clock. Guests can start the day with a rich buffet breakfast. At the Earth Spa, you can indulge in beauty therapies and massages with exclusive beauty products. There is also a mini gym, with state-of-the-art equipment, that will help you stay fit. Andronikos Hotel is only a 3-minute drive from Mykonos Town. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Myconian Naia - Preferred Hotels & Resorts
address: P.O. Box 64, Mykonos Town, Mykonos, Greece, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located in Mykonos City, Myconian Naia - Preferred Hotels & Resorts is a perfect starting point from which to explore Mykonos. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, private check in/check out, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer towels, closet, flat screen television, linens, private pool to ensure a restful night. Access to the property's fitness center, outdoor pool, spa, massage will further enhance your already satisfying stay. Myconian Naia - Preferred Hotels & Resorts is an excellent choice from which to explore Mykonos or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Alissachni Mykonos
description: Situated in Psarou, 2.9 km from Psarou Beach, Alissachni Mykonos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel offers some rooms with pool views, and rooms are equipped with a balcony. At Alissachni Mykonos rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and kosher options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Alissachni Mykonos. Platis Gialos Beach is 2.9 km from the hotel, while Mykonos Windmills is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Alissachni Mykonos.

name: Dionysos Luxury Hotel Mykonos
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Dionysos Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Dionysos Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hiking trails, hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, diving. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Dionysos Hotel.priceline.com

name: Nimbus My Aktis
description: Perched only a breath away from the famous sandy beach of Super Paradise, Nimbus My Aktis is ideally set amongst Mykonos most popular destinations. Nimbus My Aktis offers elegantly decorated units with private or shared pools or hot tubs and free WiFi access. The cosmopolitan town of Mykonos is 5 km away. Fitted with built-in beds and sofas and minimally decorated in soft tones, every villa and suite has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a modern bathroom with a shower. Most units offer views over the Aegean Sea, while others overlook the gardens. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 3 km from Nimbus My Aktis. Free, on-site parking is offered and car rental services can be provided.

name: Mykonos Soul Luxury Suites
address: Agios Stefanos, Greece Mykonos Soul Luxury Suites, Agios Stefanos 846 00
description: Set in Agios Stefanos, within 200 metres of Choulakas Beach and 600 metres of Agios Stefanos Beach, Mykonos Soul Luxury Suites offers accommodation with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 2.3 km from Tourlos Beach, 2.5 km from Mykonos New Port and 3.7 km from Archaeological Museum of Mykonos. The accommodation provides room service, a business centre and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mykonos Soul Luxury Suites the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Mykonos Old Port is 3.7 km from the accommodation, while Little Venice is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 5 km from Mykonos Soul Luxury Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apsenti couples only
description: Apsenti is the ultimate boutique settlement, exclusively for couples and honeymooners. It boasts a peaceful retreat with modern rooms, candlelit dinners and massage therapies. The Apsenti is situated less than 4km from the centre of Mykonos and a short downhill walk to the quiet sandy beach of Agios Ioannis. All rooms have a Queen size or King size bed in the suites. Apsenti is a blend of Cycladic and Modern architectural styles. Each uniquely styled room offers a relaxing and intimate setting. Modern touches include air conditioning, mini bar and LCD TV. Some rooms have outdoor whirlpools. A hearty à la carte breakfast is served until 11:30. Should guests decide to spend the day next to the pool or at their private pool and get hungry again, Mediterranean light meals can be served any time of the day. Guests are welcomed with a complimentary arrival info package including refreshing drinks. The attentive staff are readily available 24/7 assisting guests with tourist information, rental, restaurant booking and ticketing for boats and flights.

name: Santorini Secret Suites & Spa
description: Santorini Secret Suites & Spa is situated on Santorini, and offers 5-star accommodation as well as an infinity pool and free wireless internet access in all areas. The various facilities this luxury hotel has to offer include facial treatments, body treatments and a sauna. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at Santorini Secret Suites & Spa, such as 24-hour room service, an express check-in and check-out feature and a diving centre. For outdoorsy types the hotel has a wide variety of activities, including scuba diving, snorkeling and horse riding. The rooms are air conditioned and include an in-room closet, a private balcony and an alarm clock. The on-site restaurant offers fusion, Greek and Mediterranean cuisine in a modern setting. Santorini Secret Suites & Spa is within walking distance of Amoudi Bay and Tramonto ad Oia. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Oia.Revato

name: Cosmopolitan Suites
description: Cosmopolitan Suites is a popular choice amongst travelers in Santorini, whether exploring or just passing through. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, additional toilet, slippers, sofa, towels to ensure a restful night. Take a break from a long day and make use of outdoor pool, massage. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Santorini has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Cosmopolitan Suites.priceline.com

name: Andronis Boutique Hotel
description: Andronis Boutique Hotel is set in the quiet town of Oia, 4 km from Paradisos Beach. The spectacular views over the Caldera are coupled with facilities such as the hotel spa, swimming pool, organic restaurant and personalized services. Andronis suites reflect traditional Aegean style. With minimalist design and decoration, each features a private furnished balcony with sea view. Amenities include free Wi-Fi and LCD TVs, bathrobes and slippers, as well as a minibar with organic snacks. You can start your day with buffet breakfast. Santorini's rich, unique products such as its sun-dried tomatoes, capers, white eggplants and split beans are cooked with age-old recipes and new cooking methods at the Andronis restaurant. The poolside snack bar serves beverages, drinks and an all-day menu for light meals and snacks. Cooking lessons, yoga classes, private candlelit dinners and restaurant reservations can be arranged through the multilingual reception staff. There are at least ten different wineries to explore on the island, and an excellent place to begin is at the wine tasting events of the Andronis Luxury Suites. Fira, Santorini’s main town is 12 km away. Santorini Airport is at 18 km, and Athinios Port is at 20 km.

name: Villa Irini Fira Adults Only
description: No description found

name: Danae Villa
description: Danae Villa is a small, family-run hotel operating on a bed & breakfast basis. Nestled in Fira town the capital of Santorini, Danae villa offers a great base to discover Santorini. A continental breakfast is offered daily. Villa Danae provides a swimming pool with sun beds and a breakfast room. Each air-conditioned room of the Villa Danae is appointed with traditional furniture, private bathroom and private balcony. A flat-screen TV and a direct dial phone are included. Some units have a kitchenette with hobs. Less than a 10-minute walking distance from the centre of Fira, will take you to exquisite shops, restaurants, and the famous Santorini nightlife. 24-hour shuttle service is provided upon charge.

name: Grace Hotel Santorini, Auberge Resorts Collection
description: Located 2 km from Fira, the award-winning Grace Hotel Santorini is an exclusive boutique hotel offering luxurious accommodation with panoramic sea views and free WiFi. It features an infinity pool and provides in-room spa treatments. The modernly decorated rooms and suites feature design items and include a satellite TV, DVD player and a balcony. Some units also have a separate seating room and a plunge pool overlooking the sea. Grace Hotel guests can benefit from a variety of services that they can request prior to arrival, such as bathroom amenities, Apivita cosmetics, in-room fitness kit or seven-choice pillow menu. They can also choose among a wide variety of in-room drinks or special romance packages. Experience culinary excellence at Grace Hotel A Michelin-awarded voyage of sensational taste, at the heart of Santorini’s stunning Imerovigli At Varoulko Santorini, pioneering Michelin-star awarded chef Lefteris Lazarou, proposes the most mouthwatering Mediterranean creations, bursting with authenticity, flavour and Santorinian flair. Sensational renditions of Greek cuisine favourites meet a dazzling backdrop of Cycladic perfection in a journey that captivates the senses from the very first moment. Grace Hotel Santorini can arrange boat trips to nearby islands and private daily cruises. A complimentary use of laptop and iPod is possible at the reception. Situated in Imerovigli village, the hotel is 8 km away from Santorini Airport and 10 km away from Athinios Port.

name: Neo Suites
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Fira, Neo Suites provides continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. A fitness room and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. Private parking is available on site. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Neo Suites offers certain rooms with sea views, and every room is equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. At Neo Suites you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Archaeological Museum of Thera, Museum of Prehistoric Thera and Central Bus Station. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 6 km from Neo Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Canaves Oia Suites
description: Canaves Oia Suites & Spa in Oia are built on the side of a cliff overlooking the Caldera. They offer private parking and gourmet dining. A private motor yacht is available for cruises in the Aegean Sea and the islands. 2 outdoor pools, one of which is infinity-style, are featured. Canaves Oia Suites & Spa provide luxurious accommodation in spacious suites and rooms beautifully appointed with antique furniture and art objects. The property facilities include a pool bar and a 24-hour reception. Free Wi-Fi is provided in all areas. Guests may enjoy gourmet dishes served at the à la carte restaurant, while a wine cellar is available to guests. The scenic Fira Town is 11 km away and the port of Athinios is 20 km away. Santorini National Airport is at a distance of 17 km.

name: Limestone
description: Opened in summer 2018, Limestone luxury suites is set on the cliff of the caldera and is located at a historic and quiet neighborhood, with breathtaking view to the Aegean Sea, the volcanic island of Nea Kameni and the surrounding islands. Being safely removed from all the touristy hustle and bustle Limestone property is yet within walking distance from the centre of Fira. Built in absolute accordance with the traditional architecture of the island and they all provide a high-end luxury accommodation with a sense of elegance. Limestone luxury Suites offer private terraces with unique sea view to the caldera and the magnificent sunsets. All the suites are equipped with private hot tub, king size beds, satellite flat-screen TV, mini bar and free WiFi. Greek homemade breakfast is made of fresh, local and organic ingredients and is served every morning in the comfort of each suite. The nearest airport is Thira Airport and is 4 km away. The port is 3 km from Limestone.

name: Mythical Blue Luxury Suites
description: Set in a prime location of Santorini, mythical blue puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at mythical blue. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as free welcome drink, mirror, private entrance, slippers, sofa. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as boats, hot tub, outdoor pool, diving, fishing. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at mythical blue.Agoda

name: Iliovasilema Suites
description: Featuring impressive views over the Caldera from guestrooms and public areas, Iliovasilema Hotel & Suites is on the top of the cliff, 2 km from Fira. It offers a pool and snack bar. Offering elegant and minimalist décor in modern Cycladic style, all accommodation types at the Iliovasilema have flat-screen satellite TVs, well-stocked minibars and air conditioning. Free Wi-Fi is offered in all units. Iliovasilema Hotel & Suites’ bar area with views of the Aegean Sea is ideal for evening cocktails. Light dishes are served at the snack bar or through room service. Restaurants and bars are within a 3-minute walk. The hotel is 800 m from Skaros. Thira Airport is 8 km away. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange car rental.

name: Neptune Luxury Suites
description: Boasting unobstructed views of the Caldera, volcano and the Aegean Sea, the 5-star Neptune Luxury Suites consists of elegant suites with a pool or plunge pool. It is only a 10-minute’ walk from the excavations of ancient Akrotiri. Featuring restful interior décor and built-in beds, all suites open to a private terrace with sun loungers. Each consists of a separate bedroom, a spacious seating area and a modern bathroom with a shower and aromatherapy options. Guests at Neptune can start their day with a privately served breakfast. A candlelight dinner with butler service can be organised at the privacy of your terrace on request and extra charge. Massage treatments can be arranged for your relaxation. Special services include express check-in and check-out, as well as yacht and helicopter rentals. The property is located only 150 metres from the nearest beach and around 1.5 km from the famous Red Beach. Athinios Port is at a distance of 7 km, while Santorini Airport is 11 km away.

name: Kratiras View Luxury Suites
description: No description found

name: Amera Suites
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a private spa tub and a refrigerator, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include premium bedding, towels, tour/ticket assistance, and luggage storage.Expedia

name: Katikies Kirini Santorini - The Leading Hotels Of The World
description: This 5-star hotel, with its traditional architecture and its multi-levelled terraces, perches from the cliff, overlooking the blue waters of the Aegean Sea and the dramatic volcano island. The recently refurbished Kirini Santorini features additional luxury amenities, such as the new Spa and the pool area with not only lounges with sea view, but relaxing facilities carved into the cliff. The recently redecorated suites offer a serene atmosphere, wooden floors, fluffy beds and luxury bath amenities. From every suite’s veranda, the views to the water-filled Caldera are mesmerizing. Each suite has air conditioning, satellite TV, direct dial phone, safety deposit box, minibar, hair dryer, bathrobes, feather-filled pillows and luxurious bath amenities. Kirini is located in Oia, just a short 15 minutes walk to the panoramic promenade. It is 30 minutes by car from the Santorini International Airport and the Athinios Port.

name: Lotus Cave Villa
description: Lotus Cave Villa features accommodation with private balconies in the centre of Fira. The property is situated 2.9 km from Exo Gialos Beach, 10 km from Santorini Port and 11 km from Ancient Thera. The hotel has a hot tub, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a sea view. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near Lotus Cave Villa include Archaeological Museum of Thera, Megaro Gyzi and Museum of Prehistoric Thera. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 6 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Thirea Suites
description: Featuring a terrace with sun loungers and panoramic views over the Aegean Sea and the Volcano, the traditionally built Thirea Suites is located in Oía. It offers elegantly decorated suites with free WiFi access and Caldera views. Fitted with arched walls and white-wooden furnishings, each suite comes with a seating area and a balcony. Each is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a coffee machine. The modern bathrooms include bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. Some units have a private, outdoor hot tub. Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at the privacy of your balconies. Naval Museum of Oia is 1 km from Thirea Suites, while the nearest airport is Thira Airport, 10 km from Thirea Suites. The lively Fira lies within 12 km away.

name: Domes Noruz Chania, Autograph Collection- Adults Only
address: Strati Pantelaki 5, Agioi Apostoloi, Agioi Apostoloi (Crete) 731 00
description: Located in a dreamy seaside setting, Domes Noruz Chania is an adults-only 16+ lifestyle resort awarded for its novel design that combines modern Greek design with a wide range of experiences and a cosmopolitan view of the world. From delicious cocktails of local ingredients to moonlit live jazz events at the beach and helicopter rides at the breathtaking Samaria Gorge, guests are invited to a highly curated world where unique experiences are the forefront. By embracing the past and the present of the city Noruz offers a fresh, contemporary way for design-savvy guests to explore Chania and enjoy it differently. The hotel's close proximity to the city makes it even more ideal, as Chania is amongst Mediterranean’s ‘must see’ cultural destinations. The old town offers a blend of Ottoman, Venetian and Greek architectures creating a stunning setting. The promenade, the old light house, the Venetian castle, the port and the Turkish mosque are perfect for exploration.Marriott

name: Kalamaki Luxury Suites
description: The beachfront Kalamaki Luxury Suites offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi in Kalamaki. The property offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hair dryer and shower. Some units have a seating area and/or a balcony. A hot tub is featured in some units. Guests can dine in the in-house restaurant, which serves Mediterranean cuisine and also offers vegetarian options. Chania Town is 6 km from Kalamaki Luxury Suites. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Lagon Life Spirit Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
description: Located in Chania Town, 2 km from Koum Kapi Beach, Lagon Life Spirit Boutique Hotel - Adults Only provides accommodation with free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. With a garden, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features an indoor pool, spa centre and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe. Guest rooms at Lagon Life Spirit Boutique Hotel - Adults Only are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Breakfast served in room. The accommodation offers a terrace. Venizelos Graves is 2 km from Lagon Life Spirit Boutique Hotel - Adults Only, while House-Museum of Eleftherios Venizelos is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Thalassa Beach Resort - Adults Only
description: Situated on the beach of Agia Marina, 9 km from Chania, adults-only Thalassa Beach Resort offers a spa and a sea-facing pool. Its stylish rooms have floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning sea, garden or inland views. The elegant rooms are fitted with parquet floors and climate control. In-room media includes a satellite TV. Bathrooms come with a bathtub, body care products, hairdryer and magnifying mirror. Rooms include a full-length mirror. Fine dining is proposed at the a la carte main restaurant. A lighter fare is available at the snack bar, while the beach tavern serves Greek meze. Private dining on the beach can be arranged. Massage rooms and indoor pool are featured in the hotel spa. Just 1 km off the National Road, Thalassa Beach Resort is 25 km from Chania Airport and 15 km from Souda Port. A small underground parking is provided on site.

name: Elizabeth Suites
description: Esteemed guests are welcome to relax in a quite and elegant setting. Beautiful twofloor suites with one bedroom, kitchen equipment bathroom with tab, livingroom and excellent sea view are only some of the benefits that we offer. The suites are located 4 km from the town of Chania and the traditional old harbour and 8 km from Souda port. Nearby you will find restaurants, supermarkets, coffee shops, and shopping malls.The suites offer free wifi connection, tv with DVD and air condition. In the building you will also find swimming pool and jaccuzi with eight seats. The "Elizabeth Suites" promises to make your stay in Chania relaxing and unforgettable.VRBO

name: Porto Kalamaki Hotel
description: Porto Kalamaki Hotel is situated just 4 km from the picturesque city of Chania and 100 metres from Kalamaki Beach. It offers an outdoor swimming pool with poolside bar and a separate one for children. The hotel offers 48 studios and apartments with private kitchenettes and refrigerators. All units have private balconies with views of the Cretan Sea or the pool. Within close proximity from Porto Kalamaki Hotel, the villages of Agia Marina and Platanias offer a rich nightlife.

name: Chania Flair Boutique Hotel, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: Set in Chania Town, 100 metres from Nea Chora Beach, Chania Flair Deluxe Boutique Hotel - Adults Only offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Chania Flair Deluxe Boutique Hotel - Adults Only provides certain units with sea views, and the rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness centre, organise trips at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the surroundings. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Popular points of interest near Chania Flair Deluxe Boutique Hotel - Adults Only include Firkas Fortress, Etz Hayyim Synagogue and Municipal Art Gallery of Chania. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Zeus Village Resort - Adults Only
description: Just 600 metres from the beaches of Agioi Apostoloi, Zeus Village Resort - Adults Only is located in Kato Daratso in Crete. It features spacious accommodation and an outdoor seasonal swimming pool with a terrace, sun beds and umbrellas. Its self-catered units are fitted with a terrace or balcony with pool, garden or sea views. They offer air conditioning, TV, kitchenette with kitchenware, refrigerator, and seating and dining area. Some apartments include a private swimming pool. A certified Greek buffet breakfast that includes local products is served daily in the breakfast area that overlooks the hotel gardens and pool. The on-site à la carte restaurant offers lunch, and dinner in buffet style. The snack bar provides fresh juices, drinks, coffees and light meals. Massages can be arranged with the hotel’s spa and wellness centre. The tour desk can inform you on local attractions and excursions such as, hiking and cycling. Zeus Village Resort - Adults Only offers free WiFi in public areas. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Mon Repos Palace - Adults Only
description: The adults-only Mon Repos Palace - Adults Only is located at the tip of Garitsa Bay, within 1 km from the scenic Old Town of Corfu. It features a small freshwater pool with sun loungers, an elegantly decorated restaurant and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony. Each unit is equipped with a fridge, an LCD satellite TV and free WiFi. The private bathroom is stocked with a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast served daily at the on-site restaurant, where a variety of international dishes can also be enjoyed during dinner. Coffees, drinks and light meals are available at the snack bar throughout the day. Mon Repos Palace - Adults Only is situated 4 km from Corfu Port and approximately 1.5 km from Ioannis Kapodistrias International Airport. The famous Mon Repos and the Roman Baths are located at 1 km. Car rental services can be provided and free public parking can be found on site.

name: Amira Luxury Resort & Spa
description: Set in Adelianos Kampos, 200 metres from Beach Adelianos Kampos, Amira Luxury Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 1.8 km of Platanes Beach. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Amira Luxury Resort & Spa - Adults Only features certain units with sea views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. Amira Luxury Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers 5-star accommodation with an indoor pool, sauna and hammam. You can play table tennis at the hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Pirgos Beach is 2.5 km from Amira Luxury Resort & Spa - Adults Only, while Archaeological Museum of Rethymno is 7.8 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 74 km from the accommodation.

name: The Syntopia Hotel - Adults Only
description: This 4 star hotel, ideally situated opposite a golden sandy beach, only 6 km east of Rethymnon, offers guests original Cretan hospitality blended with modern comforts and amenities. The Syntopia Hotel offers simply furnished rooms with private balconies, either with mountain or pool view, equipped with free wireless internet, satellite TV and refrigerator. The complex also includes indoor and outdoor restaurant, snack bar, swimming pool. Rethymnon, one of the most historical cities of Crete influenced by Venetians and its Old Town, features a wide range of tourist and souvenir shops.

name: Casa Porto Boutique Hotel - Adults only
description: Situated in Agios Nikolaos and with Ammos Beach reachable within 700 metres, Casa Porto Boutique Hotel - Adults only features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Ammoudi Beach, 400 metres from Lake Voulismeni and 500 metres from Panagia Kera Church (in Kritsa). Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Casa Porto Boutique Hotel - Adults only rooms come with bed linen and towels. Almiros Beach is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Cretaquarium Thalassocosmos is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Heraklion International, 58 km from Casa Porto Boutique Hotel - Adults only, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Minos Palace Hotel Agios Nikolaos
description: With magnificent sea views from a rocky headland above Aghios Nikolaos Bay, this adults-only resort blends together all the ingredients for a relaxing holiday. Just 1.2 mi from the town center, this hotel with a beach-side location offers you a pleasant site from which to enjoy the north-east coast of Crete and the capital of the Lasithi province. Take time out to relax by the saltwater swimming pool or rest by the lapping waves of the hotel's private beach, where you can try various water-sports. For ultimate relaxation, indulge in a beauty treatment at the spa or unwind with a gentle stroll through landscaped gardens before dinner and drinks in the evening. This is our guests' favorite part of Agios Nikolaos, according to independent reviews.VRBO

name: Castello Infinity Suites - Adults Only
description: Castello Infinity Suites - Adults Only in Agia Pelagia has a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a garden. The hotel has a terrace and private heated plunged pools with hydromassage. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Castello Infinity Suites - Adults Only, every room includes air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A à la carte breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Heraklio Town is 13 km from the accommodation, while Hersonissos is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 16 km from the property. The hotel has a terrace and private heated plunged pools with hydromassage which subject to outside temperatures and weather conditions for months April, May, October.

name: Nikos Takis Fashion Boutique Hotel
description: Housed in a restored, historical Italian building and fitted with medieval and oriental elements, Nikos Takis Fashion Hotel is situated in the Medieval Rhodes Old Town, just 20 metres from the Grand Master’s Palace and the Street of Knights. Decorated by the famous fashion designers Nikos and Takis, all rooms have ecological Cocomat mattresses, a private bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers, satellite LCD TV and coffee maker. They open out to a balcony overlooking the Grand Master’s Palace, the Aegean Sea and the Medieval Town. A homemade breakfast prepared with fresh local ingredients can be enjoyed daily. Nikos Takis Fashion Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Bike hire and car hire can be arranged. Taxi transfer from the airport can be arranged on request and upon charge. The property offers electric bicycle rental and tours with electric bicycles upon extra charge. A welcome drink is offered to guests upon arrival. Please note, the entrance of the property is only accessible by stairs. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including diving, cycling and horse riding. The famous Deer Statues are 500 metres away and Mandraki is 300 metres away. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Rhodos Horizon Blu
description: Rhodos Horizon Blu-Adults Only is less than 1 km away from Rhodes Town, and only 50 metres from the Blue Flag Psaropoula Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, gym and sauna. The warmly decorated rooms at Rhodos Horizon Blu-Adults Only have luxurious private bathrooms. They include free Wi-Fi, TVs with satellite connection, a mini fridge and a well-stocked minibar. A selection of Greek and international dishes is served at the specialty Stage Cooking Restaurant and the a la carte Theme Restaurant. Refreshing drinks and exotic cocktails are served at the Lounge Cocktail Bar. A variety of treatment therapies, such as aromatotherapy, reflexology and body scrubs, can be provided at the spa centre, where guests can also relax using the sauna or the steam room. Rhodos Horizon Blu-Adults Only is 14 km from Rhodes Airport, while it is walking distance from the centre of Rhodes and its attractions. The island’s main port is only 1 km away. Parking on site is free, and car hire can be arranged through the 24-hour front desk.

name: Valeni Boutique Hotel & Spa
description: Valeni Boutique Hotel is located at the entrance of Portaria, offering luxurious accommodation and a variety of spa facilities within the area of Pelion. Valeni Boutique Hotel's rooms feature deluxe bathrooms and views of mountains, the Pagasetic Gulf and Makrinitsa. Guests can enjoy many ways to relax at the luxurious Valeni Spa, under the care of its professional staff. Rich breakfast is served daily at the hotel's V Restaurant. At the V bar a variety of refreshing drinks are served in a rustic and clam setting. Located 11 km from Volos and 12 km from the Agriolefkes ski resort, Valeni Boutique Hotel & Spa is an ideal destination for all seasons.

name: Infinity Blue Boutique Hotel & Spa - Adults Only
description: Offering the main outdoor swimming pool, pool bar and two restaurants, Infinity Blue Boutique Hotel & Spa is settled just a breath above the “Blue Flag” awarded beach of Hersonissos. The bright and spacious air conditioned rooms feature a stylish white-blue decor and large windows. Each one includes free wi-fi, flat-screen TV, safe box, mini-bar, coffee machine and private bathroom. There is a 24-hour front desk at Infinity Blue Boutique Hotel & Spa, as well as free WiFi in public areas. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Guests may enjoy buffet or a la carte menus at the on site restaurant Wellness options includes spa, sauna, hamam, hydromassage and hairdresser salon. Their use comes with extra charge. The lively main street, boasting an array of restaurants and bars, is located within a short walking distance of the property. A supermarket can be found at a distance of 10 metres, while a bus station is 50 m away. Nikos Kazantzakis Airport is 20 km from the property and free private parking is available on site.

name: Elea Resort - Adults Only
description: No description found

name: Aegean Suites
description: Built on a hillside and overlooking the sandy beach of Megali Ammos, the Aegean Suites is a delightful 5-star hotel. This all-suite property features a total of just 20 guest accommodations. The suites are located in the 4 traditional Greek-styled buildings nestled amongst the olive trees. Each suite is extremely spacious, featuring a separate bedroom and living room, as well as a luxury bathroom and private verandah. The Aegean Suites boasts a large swimming pool, sun-bathing area and open air hot tub. Beach lovers can enjoy the sandy beach and azure waters of Megali Ammos, just 20-metres from the hotel. The hotel also has its own beauty centre offering a range of holistic and relaxation treatments. Guests of the Aegean Suites can enjoy gourmet dining on the hotels terrace; Greek specialities are offered alongside international dishes. The poolside restaurant is open daily for light lunches. Private dining on the terrace of your very own suite can also be arranged. Energetic guests can enjoy the beachfront walk to Skiathos Town, located 1.5km away. Skiathos Town is famed for its old town, historical harbour and numerous tavernas. The Aegean Suites is a luxury hotel for adults and families with children aged 16 years and over. There are many steps around the property, which might be an issue for guests with mobility problems.

name: Katikies Chromata Santorini - The Leading Hotels of the World
description: Located in Fira, Chromata Up Style Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Santorini. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, taxi service, 24-hour front desk are just some of the facilities on offer. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find slippers, separate living room, television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, internet access wireless. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include canoe, hiking trails, hot tub, outdoor pool, diving. For reliable service and professional staff, Chromata Up Style Hotel caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Milos Cove
description: Boasting a private beach area and free WiFi throughout the property, Milos Cove is set in Thiorikhía Mílou. Featuring a restaurant, the property also features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. The hotel features a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, all suites and villas are fitted with either a private pool or plunge pool. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, and certain rooms at Milos Cove have a terrace. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the property. The hotel includes 2 bars, the Agkali Beach Bar and Pnoe Pool Bar and 2 restaurants, the Pathos Restaurant and The PathosPrive Restaurant & Opbisidian Spa. The hotel offers a business centre for guest use.
